iti12:2.1: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding anger, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
iti12:2.2: By directly knowing and completely understanding anger, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.
iti12:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
